Howard the Duck: Adventure on Volcano Island

name: Howard the Duck: Adventure on Volcano Island
storyline: The two closest companions, Phil and Beverly, find themselves imprisoned by a sinister ruler. This malevolent overlord has confined them within a live volcano, necessitating your intervention. Assuming the role of Howard the Duck, a skilled practitioner of Quack Fu, one must traverse intricate terrains, overcoming various barriers through leaps and combat manoeuvres. It's essential to steer clear of water, as Howard lacks swimming abilities and the ability to fly without the aid of the customary parachute.
summary: Howard the Duck: Adventure on Volcano Island is a game that is a tie-in to the film Howard the Duck from the same year.
